original_text: He said, ‘I have blessed my people, like the quiet stream of Shiloah. But they have not accepted my help. Instead, they are happy that King Rezin and Remaliah's son will help them.
korean_text: 이 백성이 천천히 흐르는 실로아 물을 버리고 르신과 르말리야의 아들을 기뻐하느니라

sentences.original_text: like the quiet stream of Shiloah
But they have not accepted my help
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 내 도움을 받지 않았고

sentences.original_text: that King Rezin and Remaliah's son will help them
sentences.korean_translation: 르신 왕과 르말리야의 아들이 그들을 도울 것이라고
